subject: Attention:
body:
Attention:
Greetings to you.
I am Mr. Olukayode Pitan . I have urgent secret information for you,
which will be of vital help to you, I cannot keep it further as my
conscience reminds of my duties as one who believes in equity and fair
play, my boss and some of his colleagues from several other ministries
who are assigned with the duty of transferring this funds to you have
conspired together to divert your fund to another account and the
strategy they employed was by demanding several charges from you, all
the demands are illegal just to frustrate you to abandon your funds in
order to perfect his evil activities. He has counterparts in almost
every country like United Kingdom, United States, Spain, Holland
Taiwan, Hong Kong, Indonesia and India etc.
As this will then open an avenue for them to tag your payment as
unclaimed payment and will have it transfer to their own coded account
overseas. As a matter of fact, the Executive Governor Central Bank of
Nigeria (CBN) and his colleagues instructed me to change your payment
details with the one they have just nominated for immediate payment,
note that they will frustrate you for ever if you continue dealing
with them because they will never do the right thing since the quest
for too much worldly gains has blinded their sense of reasoning, am in
charge of crediting comptroller to infuse all those information but i
am purposely delaying as my mindset does not accept such evil.
I can release this fund to you if I am sure that I will be protected
because immediately I release it, I will have to leave office, if I do
not my life will be in danger. This money will be transferred to their
private account on before 30th of August 2023. If you are willing to
get your payment direct into your account or through any other means,
call or email me and reconfirm your account particulars and other
related information's if you chooses other legitimate ways let me know
and forward your contact details to me immediately on the receipt of
this message.
Please Kindly consider this secret information as highly privileged
and should be kept till the end of time as having it divulged is a
great risk on my side and your prompt response will do you a lot of
good by having the right things done in your payment files and
documents which was regularized by unknown crooks. You should have
asked why after all the series of fees you paid yet the transaction
was still not concluded, is a deliberate act to frustrate you out of
the business.
Email me upon the receipt of this message.
Looking forward to your immediate response. For further
clarifications, do not hesitate to contact my office.
Yours faithfully.
Mr. Olukayode Pitan
Assistant to the Executive Governor (CBN).
Personal Email: 
emailolukayodepitan@gmail.com

subject: Re:   Attention:
body:
Dear Mr. Olukayode Pitan,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I appreciate your honesty and willingness to help me in this matter.

However, I would like to clarify a few things before we proceed. Could you please provide more details about the fund you mentioned? Also, could you explain what steps I need to take next?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
David

subject: RESPONSE TO MY LETTER IN RESPECT OF YOUR OUTSTANDING PAYMENT.
body:
Attention:  Mr. David

RE: RESPONSE TO MY LETTER IN RESPECT OF YOUR OUTSTANDING PAYMENT.

I acknowledge the receipt of your mail in response to my proposal letter to
you.

I appreciate your willingness to work with me in this onerous task of
ensuring that the needful is done to enable you receive your long overdue
and outstanding payment.

Before I proceed to get involved and assist you in this regard, I need the
following firm assurance, guarantee and commitment from you:

1 That from now hence till you receive your payment, all dealings in
respect of the matter shall be handled by me only.  I also want your
commitment  that all issues shall be discrete,  in secrecy and
confidentiality.  No THIRD PARTY involvement. This is with a view to safe
guiding by person because I shall be undertaking this task as a risk to my
 life and that of my family due to the nature and caliber of officials
sabotaging your payment. Secondly, I will also ensure that these officials
are not in the know of what I am doing till you receive your payment.

2 That I shall be entitled to 15% of the payment as soon as the payment is
completed.

3 That you guarantee to protect and assist my passage to your country as
soon as you receive the payment as I will no longer be  safe here after
playing my role.

If these conditions are accepted and guarantees given to me as demanded, I
shall proceed with doing the needful to make you receive your payment as I
stated in my last letter to you.

Send your personal identification document (International Passport/
National Driverâ€™s License and your private telephone number in your
response).

I await your immediate response to the above demand.

Mr. Olukayode Pitan
Assistant to the Executive Governor (CBN).
Personal Email: emailolukayodepitan@gmail.com

subject: Re: RESPONSE TO MY LETTER IN RESPECT OF YOUR OUTSTANDING PAYMENT.
body:
Dear Mr. Olukayode Pitan,

Thank you for your response. I understand the need for discretion and confidentiality in this matter, and I assure you that I will not involve any third party in our dealings.

I am ready to provide the necessary documents and information you requested. However, due to security reasons, I would like to know how these documents will be used and stored. 

As for your conditions, they seem fair considering the risk involved in this transaction. Once we have established a solid plan of action, I am willing to discuss further details about your passage to my country.

Please let me know the next steps in this process.

Best wishes,
David

subject: PROCEDURE
body:
Attention:   Mr. David

Thanks for your mail. I appreciate the fact that you and I are set to work
mutually together in order to ensure that this Long Overdue Outstanding
Payment of yours is finally released to you.

As I posted in my earlier memo, we have to handle this transaction with
utmost confidentiality. You are not to expose what I am about to do to
anyone until I conclude and you have the funds in your Bank Account.

PROCEDURE

I shall send you a Federal Ministry of Justice Application Form for a Court
Order mandating the Central Bank of Nigeria / its Agents for the
Unconditional Release of your Outstanding Payment.

I shall take this Form to a Court and obtain an Interlocutory Order of the
Court for the Unconditional Release of your payment based on Equity,
Fairness and Justice.

I shall withhold this Court Order and ensure that our Legal Department will
not have knowledge of its existence until the mandatory time allowed in law
for appeal has elapsed.

I shall then use my authority as the P.A. to the Governor of Central bank
of Nigeria to prepare and issue EXECUTIVE PAYMENT ORDER VOUCHER on your
behalf using the Official SEAL and STAMP of the Governor.

The EXECUTIVE PAYMENT ORDER VOUCHER will be marked as EXTREMELY URGENT,
CLASSIFIED, SECRET and CONFIDENTIAL. I shall include your PAYMENT VOUCHER
amongst the special Voucher of the same profile which is now being used to
pay for items / services rendered to the MILITARY / SECURITY contractors or
beneficiaries.

The Remittance Officers shall immediately effect the release of the funds
into your Bank Account without questioning / quarrying or disclosing
information about the payment as authorized by the Executive Payment Order
Voucher Instrument. Moreover, I shall be there to ensure strict compliance
as though it is from the Governor of the Central Bank himself.

Please note that once the fund hits your Bank Account, I will have to
resign my appointment and leave the country.


I pray that you will not disappoint me in the end.

You are free to ask any questions relating to this for further
clarification. Furthermore, if you are ready, indicate also so that I can
send you the Federal Ministry of Justice Application Form.

Regards.

Mr. Olukayode Pitan
Assistant to the Executive Governor (CBN).
Personal Email: emailolukayodepitan@gmail.com

subject: PROCEDURE waiting to hear from you.
body:
